name: Entomic Crushing
description:
Description

A fast paced game about smashing insect-looking enemies and trying to get the highest score on the global leaderboard. Try to manoeuvre yourself into staying alive one more second by grappling on the pillars of the arena. Are you prepared for such challenges?

Gameplay
  • Leaderboard system displaying top 25 scores.
  • Designed to keep you on your toes.
  • Difficulty evolves over time.
  • Infinitely spawning enemies.
Credits

Game created by VdlQ.

Music created by GSA.

The game was made in 2 months.

How To Use Your Abilities Grapple
  • Normal Ability - Lets you swing around.
  • Special Ability - Launches you towards the grapple point.

Attack
  • Normal Ability - Damages enemies.
  • Special Ability - Damages enemies & pulls them towards you.
